allow: Bash(PGPASSWORD=$DB_PASSWORD:-app psql -h $DB_HOST:-localhost -p $DB_PORT:-5434 -U $DB_USER:-app -d $DB_NAME:-app -c "DROP TABLE IF EXISTS app.d_employee CASCADE;")

Bash(PGPASSWORD=$DB_PASSWORD:-app psql -h $DB_HOST:-localhost -p $DB_PORT:-5434 -U $DB_USER:-app -d $DB_NAME:-app -c "DROP TABLE IF EXISTS app.ops_task_records CASCADE; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS app.ops_task_head CASCADE; DROP TABLE IF EXISTS app.ops_project_head CASCADE;")
Bash(PGPASSWORD=$DB_PASSWORD:-app psql -h $DB_HOST:-localhost -p $DB_PORT:-5434 -U $DB_USER:-app -d $DB_NAME:-app -c "SELECT id, name, email FROM app.d_employee WHERE name = ''James Miller'';")
Bash(PGPASSWORD=$DB_PASSWORD:-app psql -h $DB_HOST:-localhost -p $DB_PORT:-5434 -U $DB_USER:-app -d $DB_NAME:-app -c "SELECT id, name FROM app.d_scope_unified LIMIT 10;")

Bash(PGPASSWORD=$DB_PASSWORD:-app psql -h $DB_HOST:-localhost -p $DB_PORT:-5434 -U $DB_USER:-app -d $DB_NAME:-app -c "SELECT table_name FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_schema = ''app'' AND table_name LIKE ''%scope%'';")

Bash(DATABASE_URL="postgresql://app:app@localhost:5434/app" REDIS_URL="redis://localhost:6379" JWT_SECRET="your-super-secret-jwt-key-change-in-production" DEV_BYPASS_OIDC=true PORT=4002 pnpm dev --dir apps/api)

Bash(DATABASE_URL="postgresql://app:app@localhost:5434/app" REDIS_URL="redis://localhost:6379" JWT_SECRET="your-super-secret-jwt-key-change-in-production" DEV_BYPASS_OIDC=true PORT=4000 pnpm dev --dir apps/api)

Bash(DATABASE_URL="postgresql://app:app@localhost:5434/app" REDIS_URL="redis://localhost:6379" JWT_SECRET="your-super-secret-jwt-key-change-in-production" DEV_BYPASS_OIDC=true PORT=4000 npx tsx src/server.ts)
Bash(PGPASSWORD=app psql -h localhost -p 5434 -U app -d app -c "SELECT table_name FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_schema = ''app'' AND table_name LIKE ''%biz%'';")

Bash(PGPASSWORD=app psql -h localhost -p 5434 -U app -d app -c "
-- Create tasks for Fall 2025 Landscaping Campaign
INSERT INTO app.ops_task_head (
  name, descr, tags, attr, 
  project_id, task_code, priority_level, task_type, 
  status, planned_start_date, planned_end_date, 
  estimated_hours, actual_hours
) VALUES
-- Site Preparation Tasks
(''Site Survey and Assessment'', ''Comprehensive site evaluation including soil testing, drainage assessment, and existing landscape analysis for optimal fall landscaping preparation'', 
 ''[""site_prep"", ""assessment"", ""soil_testing"", ""drainage"", ""landscaping""]'', 
 ''{""task_category"": ""preparation"", ""equipment_needed"": [""soil_testing_kit"", ""measuring_tools"", ""camera""], ""safety_requirements"": [""safety_vest"", ""hard_hat""], ""weather_dependent"": true, ""client_coordination"": true}'',
 ''93106ffb-402e-43a7-8b26-5287e37a1b0e'', ''FALL-2025-LAND-001'', ''high'', ''field_work'',
 ''planned'', ''2025-09-01 08:00:00'', ''2025-09-03 17:00:00'', 16, 0),

(''Property Boundary Marking'', ''Mark property boundaries and establish work zones for landscaping activities, ensuring compliance with municipal requirements'',
 ''[""boundaries"", ""marking"", ""compliance"", ""zoning"", ""municipal""]'',
 ''{""task_category"": ""preparation"", ""equipment_needed"": [""surveying_equipment"", ""boundary_markers"", ""measuring_tape""], ""permits_required"": true, ""municipal_compliance"": true}'',
 ''93106ffb-402e-43a7-8b26-5287e37a1b0e'', ''FALL-2025-LAND-002'', ''high'', ''field_work'',
 ''planned'', ''2025-09-04 08:00:00'', ''2025-09-05 17:00:00'', 12, 0),

-- Equipment and Material Procurement
(''Equipment Procurement and Setup'', ''Acquire and set up all necessary landscaping equipment including excavators, aerators, seeders, and hand tools'',
 ''[""equipment"", ""procurement"", ""setup"", ""tools"", ""machinery""]'',
 ''{""task_category"": ""logistics"", ""equipment_list"": [""excavator"", ""aerator"", ""seeder"", ""rakes"", ""shovels"", ""wheelbarrows""], ""rental_coordination"": true, ""maintenance_check"": true}'',
 ''93106ffb-402e-43a7-8b26-5287e37a1b0e'', ''FALL-2025-LAND-003'', ''medium'', ''logistics'',
 ''planned'', ''2025-08-28 09:00:00'', ''2025-08-30 17:00:00'', 20, 0),

(''Material Delivery Coordination'', ''Coordinate delivery of soil amendments, mulch, fertilizers, and seasonal plants for fall installation'',
 ''[""materials"", ""delivery"", ""coordination"", ""soil"", ""plants"", ""mulch""]'',
 ''{""task_category"": ""logistics"", ""materials_list"": [""topsoil"", ""compost"", ""fall_fertilizer"", ""mulch"", ""seasonal_plants"", ""bulbs""], ""supplier_coordination"": true, ""quality_inspection"": true}'',
 ''93106ffb-402e-43a7-8b26-5287e37a1b0e'', ''FALL-2025-LAND-004'', ''medium'', ''logistics'',
 ''planned'', ''2025-09-06 08:00:00'', ''2025-09-08 17:00:00'', 18, 0),

-- Core Landscaping Tasks
(''Soil Preparation and Amendment'', ''Prepare soil through aeration, amendment addition, and pH balancing for optimal fall planting conditions'',
 ''[""soil"", ""preparation"", ""aeration"", ""amendment"", ""ph_balancing""]'',
 ''{""task_category"": ""soil_work"", ""processes"": [""soil_testing"", ""aeration"", ""amendment_application"", ""ph_adjustment""], ""weather_dependent"": true, ""quality_standards"": true}'',
 ''93106ffb-402e-43a7-8b26-5287e37a1b0e'', ''FALL-2025-LAND-005'', ''high'', ''field_work'',
 ''planned'', ''2025-09-09 08:00:00'', ''2025-09-12 17:00:00'', 28, 0),

(''Fall Seeding and Overseeding'', ''Apply grass seed and overseed existing lawn areas with cool-season varieties optimal for fall establishment'',
 ''[""seeding"", ""overseeding"", ""grass"", ""cool_season"", ""establishment""]'',
 ''{""task_category"": ""planting"", ""seed_types"": [""tall_fescue"", ""perennial_ryegrass"", ""fine_fescue""], ""application_method"": ""broadcast_seeding"", ""weather_dependent"": true}'',
 ''93106ffb-402e-43a7-8b26-5287e37a1b0e'', ''FALL-2025-LAND-006'', ''high'', ''field_work'',
 ''planned'', ''2025-09-13 08:00:00'', ''2025-09-16 17:00:00'', 24, 0),

(''Seasonal Plant Installation'', ''Install fall flowering plants, bulbs, and seasonal decorative elements for autumn and spring displays'',
 ''[""planting"", ""bulbs"", ""seasonal"", ""flowers"", ""decorative""]'',
 ''{""task_category"": ""planting"", ""plant_types"": [""mums"", ""asters"", ""spring_bulbs"", ""ornamental_kale""], ""design_coordination"": true, ""client_preferences"": true}'',
 ''93106ffb-402e-43a7-8b26-5287e37a1b0e'', ''FALL-2025-LAND-007'', ''medium'', ''field_work'',
 ''planned'', ''2025-09-17 08:00:00'', ''2025-09-20 17:00:00'', 32, 0),

-- Maintenance and Care Tasks
(''Fertilizer Application Program'', ''Apply fall-specific fertilizer program to promote root development and winter hardiness'',
 ''[""fertilizer"", ""application"", ""root_development"", ""winter_prep"", ""nutrition""]'',
 ''{""task_category"": ""maintenance"", ""fertilizer_types"": [""fall_blend"", ""root_stimulator"", ""potassium_boost""], ""application_schedule"": ""staged_approach"", ""weather_monitoring"": true}'',
 ''93106ffb-402e-43a7-8b26-5287e37a1b0e'', ''FALL-2025-LAND-008'', ''medium'', ''field_work'',
 ''planned'', ''2025-09-21 08:00:00'', ''2025-09-23 17:00:00'', 16, 0),

(''Mulching and Ground Cover'', ''Apply mulch and establish ground cover in landscaped areas for winter protection and weed suppression'',
 ''[""mulching"", ""ground_cover"", ""winter_protection"", ""weed_suppression""]'',
 ''{""task_category"": ""maintenance"", ""mulch_types"": [""shredded_hardwood"", ""leaf_mold"", ""pine_needles""], ""coverage_depth"": ""3_inches"", ""edge_definition"": true}'',
 ''93106ffb-402e-43a7-8b26-5287e37a1b0e'', ''FALL-2025-LAND-009'', ''medium'', ''field_work'',
 ''planned'', ''2025-09-24 08:00:00'', ''2025-09-27 17:00:00'', 28, 0),

-- Quality Control and Documentation
(''Quality Inspection and Documentation'', ''Conduct comprehensive quality inspection and document all work completed with photo documentation'',
 ''[""quality_control"", ""inspection"", ""documentation"", ""photography"", ""standards""]'',
 ''{""task_category"": ""quality_assurance"", ""inspection_areas"": [""seeding_coverage"", ""plant_health"", ""edge_definition"", ""cleanup""], ""documentation_required"": true, ""client_walkthrough"": true}'',
 ''93106ffb-402e-43a7-8b26-5287e37a1b0e'', ''FALL-2025-LAND-010'', ''high'', ''administrative'',
 ''planned'', ''2025-09-28 08:00:00'', ''2025-09-30 17:00:00'', 12, 0),

-- Project Management Tasks
(''Client Communication and Updates'', ''Maintain regular client communication with progress updates, schedule adjustments, and completion notifications'',
 ''[""client_communication"", ""updates"", ""progress"", ""schedule"", ""notifications""]'',
 ''{""task_category"": ""communication"", ""communication_schedule"": ""weekly_updates"", ""methods"": [""email"", ""phone"", ""site_visits""], ""documentation"": true}'',
 ''93106ffb-402e-43a7-8b26-5287e37a1b0e'', ''FALL-2025-LAND-011'', ''medium'', ''administrative'',
 ''planned'', ''2025-09-01 09:00:00'', ''2025-09-30 17:00:00'', 8, 0),

(''Weather Monitoring and Schedule Adjustment'', ''Monitor weather conditions and adjust work schedule to optimize results and avoid weather-related delays'',
 ''[""weather_monitoring"", ""schedule_adjustment"", ""optimization"", ""planning""]'',
 ''{""task_category"": ""project_management"", ""monitoring_tools"": [""weather_apps"", ""soil_temperature""], ""adjustment_criteria"": [""precipitation"", ""temperature"", ""wind""], ""contingency_planning"": true}'',
 ''93106ffb-402e-43a7-8b26-5287e37a1b0e'', ''FALL-2025-LAND-012'', ''high'', ''administrative'',
 ''planned'', ''2025-09-01 07:00:00'', ''2025-09-30 19:00:00'', 6, 0);")
